PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

 Riyadh, Saudi Arabia 
 
Developed and maintained payroll policies and processes regarding earnings and deductions. 
 
Created journal entries and ensured payroll entries are balanced and reconciled in a timely manner. 
 
Collaborated with multiple business teams within the organization such as HR and accounting. 
 
Prepared employees final settlements and indemnities according to the Saudi labour law. 
 
Provided excellent customer service to the employees.

Future New Company, Beirut, Lebanon 
 
Prepared monthly financial statements. 
 
Performed balance sheet reconciliations and revenue/expense account analyses. 
 
Assisted in developing financial performance standards, measurement and reporting tools. 
 
Participated in the annual budgeting process. 
 
Assisted management in analysing financial performance relative to financial plan and prior year. 
 
July 2013-Aug 2013 Intern in Banking and Finance 
 
Banque du Liban (Lebanese Central Bank), Beqaa, Lebanon 
  Gained knowledge around policies and procedures applied by the Lebanese monetary system.
